reviews.review_msg: Previous ratings have confused THIS Dr. Cox with one in Econ - this prof does not teach ECON!! But anyhow, psyc Dr. Cox is great, particularly if you are interesting in learning what the field of psyc is really about.  Read your text, though!!

Sometimes you ask a professor a question and they don't know the answer. That is NOT  Brianne. She is  brilliant and clearly has first hand experience with what she is talking about. She clearly cares about her students and is rare professor who you will truly appreciate one you don't have her anymore!
